name: DreadSite
description:
[WARNING] BEFORE ENTERING THE UNDERWATER CAVES TOUCH A SAVE POINT(the USBs) DUE TO A LEVEL DESIGN OVERSIGHT sorry :(

[WARNING #2]
DO NOT TRY TO EXIT THE GREEN MONOCHROME ROOM FROM THE LEFT IF YOU DO SO YOU WILL SPAWN A BOSS, PROBLEM IS HIS HURTBOX WAS DISABLED 

A forsaken planet named "Earth" has long before been devastated by war. Up until one day when a spacecraft crashed into the forgotten land, you were one of the few survivors who hadn't perished horribly or transformed into a raider who kills anything that moves. You need to leave this hellscape, not just because you want to, but because the crash has brought the raiders and other beasts closer to where you live.

> CONTROLS:
WSAD to move
K to jump
J to attack
TAB to enter inventory/map
E to interact

> CREDITS:
programming, level design, etc. by guydoesthings
art by metamast and guydoesthings

initial may layout by metamast

music and some of the sfx by maxie

get the ost here: https://maxiemakesmusic.bandcamp.com/album/dreadsite-ost
